mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PG_DRIVER WHERE D_SEQ=#{dSeq}

SELECT D_SEQ, D_NAME, D_LICENSE_TYPE, D_EDU, D_EDU_DT, D_EDU_END_DT, D_REG_DT, D_REG_USER, D_MOD_DT, D_MOD_USER, pd.COMP_CODE, pc.COMP_NAME, pc.COMP_LICENSE, pc.BLACK_LIST, D_BIRTH, D_EMAIL, D_PHONE, D_PHONE2, D_HISTORY, D_BLOOD_TYPE, D_BLOOD_SPECIAL, D_LEVEL, D_APPROVAL, D_MEMO FROM PG_DRIVER pd INNER JOIN PG_COMPANY pc ON pd.COMP_CODE=pc.COMP_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND D_SEQ=#{dSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PG_DRIVER (D_NAME, D_LICENSE_TYPE, D_EDU, D_EDU_DT, D_EDU_END_DT, D_REG_DT, D_REG_USER, COMP_CODE, D_BIRTH, D_EMAIL, D_PHONE, D_PHONE2, D_HISTORY, D_BLOOD_TYPE, D_BLOOD_SPECIAL, D_LEVEL, D_APPROVAL, D_MEMO) VALUES(#{dName}, #{dLicenseType}, #{dEdu}, #{dEduDt}, #{dEduEndDt}, #{dRegDt}, #{dRegUser}, #{compCode}, #{dBirth}, #{dEmail}, #{dPhone}, #{dPhone2}, #{dHistory}, #{dBloodType}, #{dBloodSpecial}, #{dLevel}, #{dApproval}, #{dMemo})
mapper.update: UPDATE PG_DRIVER SET COMP_CODE=#{compCode}, D_NAME=#{dName}, D_BIRTH=#{dBirth}, D_EMAIL=#{dEmail}, D_PHONE=#{dPhone}, D_PHONE2=#{dPhone2}, D_HISTORY=#{dHistory}, D_BLOOD_TYPE=#{dBloodType}, D_BLOOD_SPECIAL=#{dBloodSpecial}, D_LICENSE_TYPE=#{dLicenseType}, D_LEVEL=#{dLevel}, D_APPROVAL=#{dApproval}, D_MEMO=#{dMemo}, D_EDU=#{dEdu}, D_EDU_DT=#{dEduDt}, D_EDU_END_DT=#{dEduEndDt}, D_MOD_DT=#{dModDt}, D_MOD_USER=#{dModUser} WHERE D_SEQ=#{dSeq}
UPDATE PG_DRIVER SET D_APPROVAL='Y', D_LEVEL=#{dLevel}, D_MEMO=#{dMemo}, D_EDU=#{dEdu}, D_EDU_END_DT=#{dEduEndDt}, D_MOD_DT=#{dModDt}, D_MOD_USER=#{dModUser} WHERE D_SEQ=#{dSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILE_MANAGEMENT (F_TYPE, F_GROUP, F_NAME, F_URL, F_REG_DT) VALUES(#{fType}, #{fGroup, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fName}, #{fUrl}, #{fRegDt})
mapper.select: SELECT F_SEQ, F_TYPE, F_GROUP, F_NAME, F_URL, F_REG_DT FROM FILE_MANAGEMENT WHERE F_SEQ=#{fSeq }
